name: Fondation Rovaltain
goal: The aim of the Rovaltain Scientific Foundation is to produce and promote scientific knowledge to address health and environment issues
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: All EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related to chemicals (e.g. REACh, pesticides, biocides, cosmetics...), biodiversity and associated research activities
